name: Fargerfight Arque
description:
The Fargerfight sequel is now here.

Times have changed. Melee weapons have become obsolete.

Duel, now from a distance. All in one single device and one single touch.

Evolved. More elegant, but not less minimalist.

The same old elegance and minimalism you have known and loved.

The same simplicity and intensity that rave over one single smartphone screen.

No multi-touch required. FAs' favourite "Right Thumb vs. Left Thumb" mode returns.

Now with violence and gore in dreamy minimalist abstraction.

Free as in, totally free and with nothing attached.

Open-sourced and awaiting forks.

Available now on Android and iOS.

Made with <3 and Luxe
